sqlMap.select: select f_character_id, f_worship_id, f_contempt_id, f_time from t_worship_contempt where f_character_id = #characterId#
sqlMap.insert: insert into t_worship_contempt (f_character_id, f_worship_id,f_contempt_id, f_time) values (#characterId:INTEGER#,#worshipId:VARCHAR#,#contemptId:VARCHAR#, #time:VARCHAR#)
sqlMap.update: update t_worship_contempt set f_worship_id = #worshipId:VARCHAR#,f_contempt_id = #contemptId:VARCHAR#,f_time = #time:VARCHAR# where f_character_id=#characterId:INTEGER#
